workoutSettingsDescription: Preferences related to workouts, like parameters and units.
appearanceSettingsDescription: Customize the look and feel of RepQuest
simpleModeDescription: Only basic parameters are shown and the UI components are larger. Recommended for newcomers.
advancedModeDescription: All parameters are shown, including RPE/RIR/drop sets/supersets. UI components are smaller. Recommended for more advanced users.
systemDescription: Install app, reset all, telemetry preferences and contact.
installDescription: Install RepQuest as a phone app
noYoutube: This exercise does not have Youtube videos
noPicture: This exercise does not have picture

backup.title: Backup & Import
backup.description: Backup your training data or import data into the app
backup.importing: Importing. Please do not leave the page
backup.importSuccess: Import has been completed. RepQuest will restart now.

bulkAddExercise: Add exercises in bulk (only linear sets)

errors.pleaseValidYoutubeUrl: Please provide a valid Youtube URL
errors.invalidJSON: This backup file is not valid

useCheckboxes: Use the checkboxes to select the parameters you wish to input during workouts.

confirmDeleteWorkout.title: Delete workout
confirmDeleteWorkout.message: The workout will be removed from the workout plan, but any existing workout history entries will be kept until you delete them.

confirmDeleteWorkoutExercise.title: Delete workout exercise
confirmDeleteWorkoutExercise.message: The exercise will be removed from the workout, but any existing workout history entries will be kept until you delete them.

confirmDeleteExercise.title: Delete exercise
confirmDeleteExercise.message: The exercise will be hidden from the database, but it will still be visible in the history and any workouts that include it.

confirmDeleteSet.title: Delete set
confirmDeleteSet.message: The set will be removed from the workout, but any existing workout history entries will be kept until you delete them.

confirmDeleteSetHistory.title: Delete set from history
confirmDeleteSetHistory.message: This entry will be permanently removed from the history.

confirmDeletePlan.title: Delete plan
confirmDeletePlan.message: The plan will be deleted, but the history entries will be preserved.

enterNewPlanName: Enter the name for the new plan:
enterPlanNewName: Enter a new name for this plan:
welcomeToRepQuest: Welcome to RepQuest! Be aware this app is in testing and may present errors. We await your feedback!
thisIsTheWorkoutList: This is the workout list. It contains all the workouts you have created for this workout plan. From here you can also start a workout and manage your training plans.
thisIsTheExerciseList: This is the exercise list. From here you can look for exercises to add to your workouts. You have to create an exercise to add it to the workout.
thisIsTheWorkoutEditor: Here you will see the exercises you have added to the current workout. Start by adding an exercise to the workout.
setList: Add a set for this exercise
thisIsTheSetList: This is the list of sets. It contains the total of sets for the exercise you are editing currently. You must add a set to continue.
importWillReplaceEverything: ALL the application data will be DELETED and then the backup will be imported replacing EVERYTHING. This operation cannot be rolled back. Continue?
resetAllWarning: ALL application data will be reset. Make sure you made a backup before proceeding. Other accounts will not be affected. Are you sure you want to continue?
resetAllWarning2: Last warning: ALL application data will be RESET! Are you sure you want to continue?
deleteAllWarning: ALL application data will be reset AND your user account will be deleted. Make sure you made a backup before proceeding. Other accounts will not be affected. Are you sure you want to continue?
deleteAllWarning2: Last warning: ALL application data will be RESET and your user account will be deleted! Are you sure you want to continue?
telemetryDescription: Control your preferences on error reporting
telemetry2: When you use RepQuest, we collect some performance data around your session (browser, IP address, URL and some of your actions). When the app crashes, this information is collected into an error report we can use to investigate issues in the app.
telemetry3: NONE of your personal data is collected and the data we keep cannot identify you. This information is needed for us to debug errors proactively to give you the best experience.
telemetry4: The information is processed by Sentry (sentry.io). NO tracking is performed in our product. We serve no ads and thus the data we collect is strictly for technical purposes only.
telemetry5: We encourage users to keep telemetry on, since this will allow us to improve the product and fix the issues you encounter, but we understand some users might not be keen to sharing this data with us and hence we offer you to disable telemetry through this option.
weightlogWillRestart: If you change this preference, RepQuest will restart
reloadDescription: Sometimes RepQuest might get stuck, reloading the page could fix the issues.
autoStopDescription: Stop and save a workout automatically if it's been unchanged for one hour

login.enterNewUsername: Enter the name of the new account

notImplemented.title: Not implemented
notImplemented.description: Sorry, this feature is still in development. Come back soon to try it out!

csvImportDisclaimer: The CSV import feature is written to support importing workouts from another app. This should be a one way process. It is not complete and may not be reliable, so use a JSON file where possible. You will have to check the workouts to ensure everything is alright, since this is a best-effort process.
noHistoryEntries: There are no entries in the history for the selected day

metrics.title: Body measurements
metrics.saveNewValues: Save the measures from this dialog

notApplicableForThis: No data or not appliable for this exercise
notes: Type notes here or click the icon to add an emoji
reactionEmojisDescription: Choose the default emotes to show in the notes section
feedbackDescription: Send us a bug report or comments to improve our app

login.logged_in: You are now logged into WeightCloud as {{user}}
login.logged_out: You've sucessfully logged out from WeightCloud
login.synced: You are in sync with WeightCloud

weightcloud.alpha: WeightCloud is under testing and it's only available for selected users. If you want to participate in our tests, please reach out to us.

onboarding.title: Welcome to RepQuest
onboarding.menuDescription: Configure RepQuest again with the Welcome Assistant

welcome.title: Welcome
welcome.subtitle: Welcome to RepQuest!
welcome.message: This app will be your training companion, with which you will be able to log your workouts, track your progress and much more!
welcome.disclaimer1: Unlike other similar apps in the market, this app does not provide any own content. This means that you will have to provide your own workouts.
welcome.disclaimer2: RepQuest does not provide fitness advice. If you need advice using this app, refer to a qualified professional. The physical activities that your perform with this app are under your own risk and responsiblity.
welcome.disclaimer3: This app does not have any kind of warranty. Remember that RepQuest is still under active development and may present errors. Please report to us if you identify any problem using this app.

license.title: License
license.pleaseRead: Please, read the terms and conditions of the following license before proceeding.
license.accept: I have read and accept the terms of the license

importData.title: Import data
importData.message: RepQuest does not provide any workouts by default. Do you have any data file or backup that you want to restore, or are you starting from scratch?
importData.importFile: I want to import a data file
importData.willRedirect: You will be redirected to the Backups & Import page when finishing this assistant.
importData.noThanks: No, I will create a workout from scratch
importData.importDataset: No, but add exercises from Free Exercise DB to the database

backups.title: Backups
backups.message1: RepQuest saves the workout logs in your browser. This means you may lose all your data if you clear your browser cookies.
backups.message2: When you finish your workout, RepQuest will provide you with an option to save a backup file, that will be downloaded as a file to your device, and that you can restore later from the settings menu.
backups.message3: We recommend that you perform backups periodically. In a future we will offer automatic cloud backups with Google Drive and our WeightCloud service.

completed.title: All ready!
completed.message: That's it for now. Click on Finish to start using RepQuest.

wrapped.menuEntryDescription: Find out what you achieved this
wrapped.thanks: Thank you for training with RepQuest this %Y!

eol.title: RepQuest is now RepQuest!
eol.message: Thank you for being one of the first users to collaborate in the development of WeightLog.
eol.message2: The cycle has come to an end. RepQuest is closing and now we will be RepQuest.
eol.message3: Unfortunately, we cannot migrate your data automatically. Since we are in a new address (find us at client.repquest.app), you have to migrate manually your database.
eol.message4: Click on the button below to download a full backup of your account, that you will be able to import to RepQuest when logging in for the first time. If you need help for the migration, please contact us at info@repquest.app.
eol.message5: Thank you for using WeightLog. See you in RepQuest!
